mapper.select: SELECT A.USER_CODE, A.USER_NAME, A.USER_ID, A.user_pic, B.pq_code, B.pq_name, C.pass_start, C.pass_end, B.pq_price, D.sales_date, D.sales_method FROM USERDB A LEFT JOIN validatedb E ON E.user_code = A.user_code LEFT JOIN passdb C ON C.pass_code = E.pass_code LEFT JOIN salesdb D ON D.user_code = A.user_code LEFT JOIN passqualdb B ON C.pq_code = B.pq_code WHERE A.user_role = 'MEMBER' order by C.pass_start desc , D.sales_date desc;

SELECT A.pass_code, A.pq_code, B.pq_name, A.pass_status, A.pass_start, A.pass_end, A.pass_total, A.pass_use, A.user_code, D.user_pic, B.pq_price, D.user_name, E.sales_method, E.sales_date FROM passdb A left JOIN passqualdb B ON A.pq_code = B.pq_code left join validatedb C on A.pass_code = C.pass_code left join userdb D on C.user_code = D.user_code left join salesdb E on D.user_code = E.user_code order by A.pass_start desc , E.sales_date desc;

SELECT A.user_pic, A.user_name, A.user_role, SUM(CASE WHEN A.user_role = 'ADMIN' or A.user_role = 'USER' THEN D.pq_price ELSE 0 END) AS total1 from userdb A join employeedb B on A.user_code=B.user_code left join passdb C on C.user_code=B.user_code left join passqualdb D on C.pq_code=D.pq_code GROUP BY A.user_code order by A.user_name;

SELECT month.month, COALESCE(SUM(B.pq_price), 0) AS total FROM ( SELECT '01' AS month UNION SELECT '02' UNION SELECT '03' UNION SELECT '04' UNION SELECT '05' UNION SELECT '06' UNION SELECT '07' UNION SELECT '08' UNION SELECT '09' UNION SELECT '10' UNION SELECT '11' UNION SELECT '12' ) AS month LEFT JOIN passdb A ON SUBSTRING(A.pass_start, 6, 2) = month.month LEFT JOIN passqualdb B ON A.pq_code = B.pq_code GROUP BY month.month ORDER BY month.month;

SELECT A.USER_CODE, A.USER_NAME, A.USER_ID, A.user_pic, B.pq_code, B.pq_name, C.pass_start, C.pass_end, B.pq_price, D.sales_date, D.sales_method, A.user_etc FROM USERDB A LEFT JOIN validatedb E ON E.user_code = A.user_code LEFT JOIN passdb C ON C.pass_code = E.pass_code LEFT JOIN salesdb D ON D.user_code = A.user_code LEFT JOIN passqualdb B ON C.pq_code = B.pq_code
AND A.USER_NAME Like CONCAT('%', #{ text }, '%')
AND A.USER_ID Like CONCAT('%', #{ text }, '%')
AND DATE_FORMAT(C.pass_start, '%m') = LPAD(#{text}, 2, '0')
AND A.USER_NAME Like CONCAT('%', #{ text }, '%')
AND QUARTER(C.pass_start) = 1
AND QUARTER(C.pass_start) = 2
AND QUARTER(C.pass_start) = 3
AND QUARTER(C.pass_start) = 4
AND A.USER_ROLE = 'MEMBER'
order by C.pass_start desc , D.sales_date desc;

SELECT F.user_code, E.USER_CODE as emp_code, F.USER_NAME, F.USER_ID, E.user_pic, B.pq_code, B.pq_name, C.pass_start, C.pass_end, B.pq_price, D.sales_date, D.sales_method, E.user_etc, E.user_name as emp_name FROM validatedb A LEFT JOIN passdb C ON C.pass_code = A.pass_code LEFT JOIN userdb E ON E.user_code = C.user_code LEFT JOIN salesdb D ON D.user_code = A.user_code left join userdb F on F.user_code = D.user_code LEFT JOIN passqualdb B ON C.pq_code = B.pq_code order by C.pass_start desc , D.sales_date desc;

SELECT F.user_code, E.USER_CODE as emp_code, F.USER_NAME, F.USER_ID, E.user_pic, B.pq_code, B.pq_name, C.pass_start, C.pass_end, B.pq_price, D.sales_date, D.sales_method, E.user_etc, E.user_name as emp_name FROM validatedb A LEFT JOIN passdb C ON C.pass_code = A.pass_code LEFT JOIN userdb E ON E.user_code = C.user_code LEFT JOIN salesdb D ON D.user_code = A.user_code left join userdb F on F.user_code = D.user_code LEFT JOIN passqualdb B ON C.pq_code = B.pq_code where F.user_id = #{userId} order by C.pass_start desc , D.sales_date desc
